summary_promot:

img_summary: The image depicts a wooden box containing a branch with several round, beige-colored fruits or bulbs attached to it. This item is likely a collectible or resource within the game, possibly used for crafting, trading, or as a quest item. The environment appears to be dimly lit, suggesting it might be found in an indoor or underground setting. There are no visible characters, enemies, or UI components in the image, focusing solely on the item itself.
